00037 void EAnalyze::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *opt) {
00038 
00039     string key = "options.eanalyze";
00040 
00041     _resolution_pairs = opt->get(key+".resolution_pairs").as< double >();
00042     _resolution_sites = opt->get(key+".resolution_sites").as< double >();
00043     _resolution_space = opt->get(key+".resolution_space").as< double >();
00044 }

00046 bool EAnalyze::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00047 
00048     // Calculate
00049     // ... Site-energy histogram, mean, width
00050     // ... Pair-energy histogram, mean, width
00051     // ... Site-energy correlation
00052 
00053     QMNBList &nblist = top->NBList();
00054 
00055     int state = -1;
00056 
00057     if (!top->Segments().size()) {
00058         cout << endl << "... ... Charge state " << state;
00059         cout << endl << "... ... ... No segments in topology. Skip ... "
00060              << flush;
00061     }
00062     else {
00063         SiteHist(top, state);
00064         SiteCorr(top, state);
00065     }
00066 
00067     
00068 
00069     if (!nblist.size()) {
00070         cout << endl << "... ... Charge state " << state;
00071         cout << endl << "... ... ... No pairs in topology. Skip ... "
00072              << flush;
00073     }
00074     else {
00075         PairHist(top, state);
00076     }
00077 
00078     
00079 
00080     state = +1;
00081 
00082     if (!top->Segments().size()) {
00083         cout << endl << "... ... Charge state " << state;
00084         cout << endl << "... ... ... No segments in topology. Skip ... "
00085              << flush;
00086     }
00087     else {
00088         SiteHist(top, state);
00089         SiteCorr(top, state);
00090     }
00091 
00092     if (!nblist.size()) {
00093         cout << endl << "... ... Charge state " << state;
00094         cout << endl << "... ... ... No pairs in topology. Skip ... "
00095              << flush;
00096     }
00097     else {
00098         PairHist(top, state);
00099     }
00100 
00101 }
00102 
00103 void EAnalyze::SiteHist(Topology *top, int state) {
00104 
00105     vector< double > Es;
00106     Es.reserve(top->Segments().size());
00107 
00108     double MIN = top->Segments()[0]->getEMpoles(state);
00109     double MAX = top->Segments()[0]->getEMpoles(state);
00110     double AVG = 0.0;
00111     double VAR = 0.0;
00112     double STD = 0.0;
00113 
00114     // Collect energies from segments, calc AVG
00115     vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit;
00116     for (sit = top->Segments().begin(); 
00117          sit < top->Segments().end();
00118          ++sit) {
00119 
00120         double E = (*sit)->getEMpoles(state);
00121 
00122         MIN = (E < MIN) ? E : MIN;
00123         MAX = (E > MAX) ? E : MAX;
00124         AVG += E / top->Segments().size();
00125         
00126         Es.push_back(E);
00127     }
00128 
00129     _site_avg = AVG;
00130 
00131     // Prepare bins
00132     int BIN = int( (MAX-MIN)/_resolution_sites + 0.5 ) + 1;
00133     vector< vector<double> > histE;
00134     histE.resize(BIN);
00135 
00136     // Execute binning, calc VAR
00137     vector< double > ::iterator eit;
00138     for (eit = Es.begin(); eit < Es.end(); ++eit) {
00139 
00140         int bin = int( (*eit-MIN)/_resolution_sites + 0.5 );
00141         histE[bin].push_back(*eit);
00142         VAR += ((*eit) - AVG)*((*eit) - AVG) / top->Segments().size();
00143     }
00144 
00145     vector< int > histN;
00146     histN.resize(BIN);
00147     for (int bin = 0; bin < BIN; ++bin) {
00148         histN[bin] = histE[bin].size();
00149     }
00150 
00151     STD = sqrt(VAR);
00152 
00153     FILE *out;
00154     string tag = boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())
00155                + "_SITES_" + ( (state == -1) ? "A" : "C" ) + ".dat";
00156     out = fopen(tag.c_str(), "w");
00157 
00158     fprintf(out, "# EANALYZE: SITE-ENERGY HISTOGRAM \n");
00159     fprintf(out, "# AVG %4.7f STD %4.7f MIN %4.7f MAX %4.7f \n", 
00160                     AVG,      STD,      MIN,      MAX);
00161 
00162     for (int bin = 0; bin < BIN; ++bin) {
00163         double E = MIN + bin*_resolution_sites;
00164         fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4d \n", E, histN[bin]);
00165     }
00166     fclose(out);
00167 }

00169 
00170 void EAnalyze::PairHist(Topology *top, int state) {
00171 
00172     QMNBList &nblist = top->NBList();
00173     QMNBList::iterator pit;
00174 
00175     double MIN = nblist.front()->Seg1()->getEMpoles(state)
00176                - nblist.front()->Seg2()->getEMpoles(state);
00177     double MAX = nblist.front()->Seg1()->getEMpoles(state)
00178                - nblist.front()->Seg2()->getEMpoles(state);
00179     double AVG = 0.0;
00180     double VAR = 0.0;
00181     double STD = 0.0;
00182 
00183     FILE *out_dEs;
00184     string tag_dEs = boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())
00185                + "_PAIRSLIST_" + ( (state == -1) ? "A" : "C" ) + ".dat";
00186     out_dEs = fopen(tag_dEs.c_str(), "w");
00187 
00188     // Collect site-energy differences from neighbourlist
00189     vector< double > dEs;    
00190     for (pit = nblist.begin(); pit != nblist.end(); ++pit) {
00191 
00192         Segment *seg1 = (*pit)->Seg1();
00193         Segment *seg2 = (*pit)->Seg2();
00194 
00195         double dE = seg2->getEMpoles(state) - seg1->getEMpoles(state);
00196 
00197         MIN = (dE < MIN) ? dE : MIN;
00198         MIN = (-dE < MIN) ? -dE : MIN;
00199         MAX = (dE > MAX) ? dE : MAX;
00200         MAX = (-dE > MAX) ? -dE : MAX;
00201         AVG += dE / nblist.size();
00202         
00203         dEs.push_back(dE);
00204         dEs.push_back(-dE);
00205 
00206         fprintf(out_dEs, "%5d %5d %4.7f \n", seg1->getId(), seg2->getId(), dE);
00207     }
00208     fclose(out_dEs);
00209     
00210     // Prepare bins
00211     int BIN = int( (MAX-MIN)/_resolution_pairs + 0.5 ) + 1;
00212     vector< vector<double> > histE;
00213     histE.resize(BIN);
00214     
00215     // Execute binning, calc VAR
00216     vector< double > ::iterator eit;
00217     for (eit = dEs.begin(); eit < dEs.end(); ++eit) {
00218 
00219         int bin = int( ((*eit)-MIN)/_resolution_pairs + 0.5 );
00220 
00221         histE[bin].push_back((*eit));
00222         VAR += ((*eit) - AVG)*((*eit) - AVG) / nblist.size();
00223     }
00224 
00225     vector< int > histN;
00226     histN.resize(BIN);
00227     for (int bin = 0; bin < BIN; ++bin) {
00228         histN[bin] = histE[bin].size();
00229     }
00230 
00231     STD = sqrt(VAR);
00232 
00233     FILE *out;
00234     string tag = boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())
00235                + "_PAIRS_" + ( (state == -1) ? "A" : "C" ) + ".dat";
00236     out = fopen(tag.c_str(), "w");
00237 
00238     fprintf(out, "# EANALYZE: PAIR-ENERGY HISTOGRAM \n");
00239     fprintf(out, "# AVG %4.7f STD %4.7f MIN %4.7f MAX %4.7f \n",
00240                     AVG,      STD,      MIN,      MAX);
00241 
00242     for (int bin = 0; bin < BIN; ++bin) {
00243         double E = MIN + bin*_resolution_pairs;
00244         fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4d \n", E, histN[bin]);
00245     }
00246     fclose(out);
00247 }
00248 
00249 
00250 void EAnalyze::SiteCorr(Topology *top, int state) {
00251 
00252     double AVG = 0.0;
00253     double VAR = 0.0;
00254     double STD = 0.0;
00255 
00256     vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit1;
00257     vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit2;    
00258 
00259     // Calculate mean site energy
00260     vector< double > Es;
00261 
00262     vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit;
00263     for (sit = top->Segments().begin();
00264          sit < top->Segments().end();
00265          ++sit) {
00266 
00267         double E = (*sit)->getEMpoles(state);
00268         AVG += E / top->Segments().size();
00269 
00270         Es.push_back(E);
00271     }
00272 
00273     // Calculate variance
00274     vector< double > ::iterator eit;
00275     for (eit = Es.begin(); eit < Es.end(); ++eit) {
00276 
00277         VAR += ((*eit) - AVG)*((*eit) - AVG) / top->Segments().size();
00278     }
00279 
00280     // Collect inter-site distances, correlation product
00281     vector< double > Rs;
00282     vector< double > Cs;
00283 
00284     double MIN = +1e15;
00285     double MAX = -1e15;
00286     
00287     for (sit1 = top->Segments().begin(); sit1 < top->Segments().end(); ++sit1) {
00288     for (sit2 = sit1 + 1;                sit2 < top->Segments().end(); ++sit2) {
00289 
00290         double R = abs(top->PbShortestConnect((*sit1)->getPos(),
00291                                               (*sit2)->getPos()));
00292 
00293         MIN = (R < MIN) ? R : MIN;
00294         MAX = (R > MAX) ? R : MAX;
00295 
00296         double C = ((*sit1)->getEMpoles(state) - AVG)
00297                  * ((*sit2)->getEMpoles(state) - AVG);
00298 
00299         Rs.push_back(R);
00300         Cs.push_back(C);
00301 
00302     }}
00303 
00304     // Prepare bins
00305     int BIN = int( (MAX-MIN)/_resolution_space + 0.5 ) + 1;
00306     vector< vector<double> > histCs;
00307     histCs.resize(BIN);
00308 
00309     for (int i = 0; i < Rs.size(); ++i) {
00310 
00311         int bin = int((Rs[i] - MIN)/_resolution_space + 0.5);
00312         histCs[bin].push_back(Cs[i]);
00313     }
00314 
00315     // Calculate spatial correlation
00316     vector< double > histC;
00317     histC.resize(BIN);
00318     for (int bin = 0; bin < BIN; ++bin) {
00319 
00320         double corr = 0.0;
00321         for (int i = 0; i < histCs[bin].size(); ++i) {
00322             corr += histCs[bin][i] / VAR / histCs[bin].size();
00323         }
00324         histC[bin] = corr;
00325     }
00326 
00327     FILE *out;
00328     string tag = boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getDatabaseId())
00329                + "_CORR_" + ( (state == -1) ? "A" : "C" ) + ".dat";
00330     out = fopen(tag.c_str(), "w");
00331 
00332     fprintf(out, "# EANALYZE: SPATIAL SITE-ENERGY CORRELATION \n");
00333     fprintf(out, "# AVG %4.7f VAR %4.7f MIN_R %4.7f MAX_R %4.7f \n",
00334                     AVG,      VAR,      MIN,      MAX);
00335 
00336     for (int bin = 0; bin < BIN; ++bin) {
00337         double R = MIN + bin*_resolution_space;
00338         fprintf(out, "%4.7f %4.7f \n", R, histC[bin]);
00339     }
00340     fclose(out);
00341 }
